sentences.en: They had employed heavies to evict squatters from neighbouring sites.
sentences.cn: 他们雇了一些打手，以赶走来自邻近地区的私自占地者。

sentences.en: Evict late-night television from your bedroom.
sentences.cn: 不要深夜还在卧室看电视。

sentences.en: A giant—or the two dozen policemen who are about to evict him?
sentences.cn: 是传说中的巨人还是两队警察打算来赶走主人公？
